column4: hello, i use ubuntu 10.10 with gnome desktop manager, the problem is that at the top panel the icons are mixed up and some of them are dislplayed more than once. this happens every time i'm loging in to the system. What can i do to solve this, it is very  frustating to delete the .gnome related hodden files every time

this happens till i remember the name ubuntu :(
